website_summaries.verdict: This Disney princess stamp kit makes the perfect toy for little ones who love crafts, and is priced at an terrific value.
pros: Features 9 sturdy stamps which are housed in an organized wooden tray
Includes colored pencils as well as 2 different colored ink pads
The stamps are a fitting size to suit little hands
cons: Tray does not have a lid

website_summaries.verdict: An affordable stamp set that is great for kids who love princesses and arts and crafts.
pros: Includes nine different Disney princess stamps, including Belle, Ariel, and Cinderella, 5 colored pencils, and an ink pad with 2 colors
Stamps are sturdy and made of wood
Comes with a wood storage case
cons: The ink pad tends to dry out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Disney Wooden Stamps - Princesses
customer_reviews.text: It was a cute set of stamps. Pros: -had a lof the the popular disney princesses -sturdy wooden container that hold the stamps -the rubber stamps were nicely constructed and looks like they'll hold up for many uses Cons: -wish the wooden container was a little bigger - it was hard to get the stamps in/out of it -the color pencils were cheap. They do not sharpen well. We didn't get it for the color pencils so it wasn't a huge deal -stamps pad was cheap. It didn't stamp well and dried up quickly
customer_reviews.author: Q Wan

customer_reviews.title: Cute set!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for a 5 year old’s birthday. She’s obsessed with princesses and is now at the age where she enjoys sitting down to color and draw. She also had two little sisters so this was a nice treat that she could have for herself. This set is SUPER cute and I love the wood box it comes in great to keep it all organized and you could repurpose it down the road. It’s also apparently mom approved because I was told that when the littles nap, this keeps big sis plenty occupied so mom can relax a bit or get a few things done around the house. I always have good luck with Melissa & Doug toys!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Ink pad molded in 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute stamp set, but 2 weeks after opening ink pad was molding!
customer_reviews.author: Himself

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little Princess lovers
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. My daughter is obsessed with princesses and she loves stamping each princess. I wish it came with different color ink bc the pink doesn’t show up that well. Perfect little set to color and stamp. Not the highest quality but great for a little one. Also it’s washable!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonObsessed

customer_reviews.title: Great stamps.. not so great ink pad
customer_reviews.text: This would be a really great product if the ink pad had more color. It’s super faint and the coloring pencils don’t have a good color as well. I think I will just purchase a different ink pad and have Daughter use the stamps because they are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: LindaAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: This stamp set is fantastic! The details are great and my little one loves coloring in her princesses. I love how the set includes two colors of ink and also the pencils. The stamps are high quality and the perfect size for little hands too!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Cute Set
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old daughter after she developed a sticker obsession. She could go through a sheet of stickers in seconds, so I figured this was the next best thing and would last a lot longer. She loves it! The set is a good quality and includes a nice variety of stamps that all feature recognizable characters. I would highly recommend to anyone with a little princess fan in their life.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: the stamps appear fine, but I cant tell because the ink pad has so little ink in it. email the company to see it I could get a replacement for the ink pad, but didn't get a replay. I purchased Melissa &Doug items before, but it appear there quality control is in need of a quality control. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but I got a dry ink pad ☹️
customer_reviews.text: It is a very cute product, very catchy for kids. I give it one star review because the ink pad was totally dry. I gave it as a present so I couldn't return it. I wish whoever is the person the checks the quality of the products would catch this little details.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste J.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - big disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: The ink pads were useless. They were so dry and had almost no color. I had hoped this would be a fun activity for me and my four year old granddaughter but the quality of the product was very poor.
customer_reviews.author: still hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Great stamping set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a 3 year old who was having a "princess" party :) She LOVES it. I think it was her first stamp set and while the box says for 4+ with supervision she played with this for quite a while. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: annampet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My three year old daughter is obsessed. We stamp her hand when she gets on the bus each morning and she loves it. The pink ink is a little light for hand stamping, but she hasn’t complained.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Cute & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6yr old daughter for her birthday, she loves it!! Its easy to use & not to big or heavy. Since shes just at home due to the pandemic so this is perfect to keep her entertained.

customer_reviews.title: Gifted and loved

customer_reviews.title: Great for the little artist

customer_reviews.author: NortheastTacoma

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute product. My daughter plays with her stamps daily. The only thing I wish it had was a pencil sharpener.

customer_reviews.title: Good for play time
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my brother-in-laws young daughter. It has a nice assortment of stamps and colored pencils for play time.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Cute stamp set for toddler, pass on the colored pencils
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 2 year old daughter. She loves stamping and was very excited to have a princess set! She uses it often still (we've had it a few months) and is able to use independently. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 due to the lightness of the ink (the pink ink is very light on paper) and quality of the colored pencils (only work if you press hard which is difficult for a toddler, might be easier for older kids).
customer_reviews.author: MaryJo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sweet chunky for small hands to grab
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughters love these. My only complaint would be the stamp pads. They seem kind of dried out already. I added a drop of water to them but the ink jist didn't show very well. No big deal for us because we have many colored ink pads for stamps in our house. If you aren't a big craft family just be aware you may need to invest in an additional stamp pad.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Barely Visible Ink
customer_reviews.text: I typically like Melissa & Doug items but am very unimpressed with this. You can press the stamp into the ink pad with all your might and still barely see the print on paper. 4 year old here tried 10 or 12 times and gave up. Can't blame her.

customer_reviews.title: Nice

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Disney Princess Wooden Stamp Set
product_meta.description:
When your little princess is ready to have a ball, she will love designing her own royal adventures with this exquisitely detailed stamp set. A two-color stamp pad, five colored pencils, and nine fabulously regal stamps are all packed in a sturdy wooden tray. The Melissa & Doug Disney princess stamp set is sure to inspire creativity in kids and grown-ups alike. Help children identify the image on each stamp, or ask the children to place the stamps in a row, counting them as they line them up. Or try stamping a pattern and asking the children to replicate the pattern, copying both colors and shapes. The Wooden Stamp Set Disney Princesses is a delightful and educational gift for kids ages 4 and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Wooden Princess Wand Craft kit to round out the hands-on play experience and to give kids an engaging option for screen-free fun. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: ENTERTAINING PRINCESS-THEMED STAMP SET: The Melissa & Doug Wooden Stamp Set Disney Princesses includes 9 stamps, a 2-color inkpad, and 5 colored pencils. It also comes with a storage box.
WASHABLE INK: Our Melissa & Doug Disney princess stamps feature washable ink, which makes cleanup convenient and easy.
STURDY WOODEN STORAGE BOX: This princess stamp set comes with a sturdy wooden box for convenient storage.

GIFT FOR KIDS 4 AND UP: The Wooden Stamp Set Disney Princesses is an educational gift for kids ages 4 and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Wooden Princess Wand Craft kit to round out the hands-on play experience and to give kids an engaging option for screen-free fun.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!
